argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_inxp | |- ( ( A X. B ) i^i ( A X. C ) ) = ( ( A i^i A ) X. ( B i^i C ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_inidm | |- ( A i^i A ) = A |
| 3 | 2 | #P_xpeq1i | |- ( ( A i^i A ) X. ( B i^i C ) ) = ( A X. ( B i^i C ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_eqtr2i | |- ( A X. ( B i^i C ) ) = ( ( A X. B ) i^i ( A X. C ) ) |
